comment._content:
Is it the pantomime season ?
"He's behind you!"

comment.author: 33075566@N08
comment._content: South Eastern Railway 0-4-4T no 144, built at Ashford in 1878, at Lewisham Junction in 1885, according to the caption to this splendid photo in the RCTS Locomotive History of the South Eastern Railway.
